title: Scrubber Parameters
description: Factors that control the behavior of a Java class that removes private parts of a data object before the object is shared

removeDate.description: When true, remove all date fields from output
removeDate.title: Remove Date

deidentifyAuditUser.description: When true, remove users listed as creator or modifier of records and subrecords
deidentifyAuditUser.title: Deidentify Audit User

deidentifiedReferencePatterns.description: References to replace (pattern applies to document type)
deidentifiedReferencePatterns.title: Deidentified Reference Patterns

accessGroupsToInclude.description: names of access groups to that will NOT be removed
accessGroupsToInclude.title: Access Groups to Include

accessGroupsToRemove.description: names of access groups to that WILL be removed
accessGroupsToRemove.title: Access Groups to Remove

removeAllLocked.description: When true, remove any data element that is marked as non-public
removeAllLocked.title: Remove all Locked

removeCodesBySystem.description: When true, remove any Codes whose CodeSystem is on the list
removeCodesBySystem.title: Remove Codes by System

removeReferencesByCriteria.description: When true, remove any References that meet specified criteria
removeReferencesByCriteria.title: Remove References by Criteria

referenceTypesToRemove.description: Document Types to look at.  When a Reference is of that document type, remove it
referenceTypesToRemove.title: Reference Types to Remove

citationPatternsToRemove.description: Patterns (RegExes) to apply to Reference citation.  When a citation matches, remove the Reference
citationPatternsToRemove.title: Citation Patterns to Remove

excludeReferenceByPattern.description: Remove References by looking at citationPatternsToRemove
excludeReferenceByPattern.title: Exclude Reference by Pattern

substanceReferenceCleanup.description: When true, next criteria are used to process substance references
substanceReferenceCleanup.title: Substance Reference Cleanup

removeReferencesToFilteredSubstances.description: When true, when a substance is removed, remove any references to it
removeReferencesToFilteredSubstances.title: Remove References to Filtered Substances

removeReferencesToSubstancesNonExportedD.description: When true, when a substance's definition is removed, remove any references to it
removeReferencesToSubstancesNonExportedD.title: Remove References to Substances Non-Exported Definitions

removeChangeReason.description: When true, delete the 'Change Reason' field
removeChangeReason.title: Remove Change Reason

removeApprovalId.description: When true, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is removed
removeApprovalId.title: Remove Approval Id

approvalIdCodeSystem.description: When this parameter has a value, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is copied to a code of this specified system
approvalIdCodeSystem.title: Remove Approval Id

regenerateUUIDs.description: When true, all UUIDs in the object being exported will be given a newly-generated value
regenerateUUIDs.title: Regenerate UUIDs

changeAllStatuses.description: When true, all status value in the object being exported will be given a value
changeAllStatuses.title: Change All Statuses

newStatusValue.description: new string value to assign to all individual status fields throughout the object
newStatusValue.title: New Status Value

newAuditorValue.description: new string value to assign to all auditor (creator/modifier) fields throughout the object
newAuditorValue.title: New Auditor Value
